title: Incantation Discography 320 [www.metal-legions.com]
description:
[quote]One of the first bands to sign to Relapse Records.
Incantation was formed by John McEntee and Paul Ledney of Profanatica. They had previously played together in Revenant (US).
McEntee has also been in Mortician (US) and Immolation for a brief period, and currently plays rhythm guitar in his wife Jill&#039;s band Funerus.
Incantation is very likely to be the Metal band that has used the highest number of different live members. They aren&#039;t shown here for sanity&#039;s sake.
For Central Illinois Metalfest 2008, along with a few other shows throughout 2008, Craig Pillard was to handle live vocals, but no showed the events.[/quote]

Current line-up 
John McEntee - Guitar, Vocals (Goreaphobia, Mortician (US), Funerus, Immolation, Revenant)
Chuck Sherwood - Bass (Blood Storm)
Alex Bouks - Guitar (Engorge (US), Goreaphobia) 
Jim Roe - Drums (Morbid Sin, WOMB, Disciples of Mockery, Engorge (US), 2006 Tour Drummer for Speed Kill Hate, Mr. Grim) 

Pack includes - 
Demo # 1 Demo, 1990 
Entrantment of Evil EP, 1990  
Deliverance of Horrific Prophecies EP, 1991  
Onward to Golgotha Full-length, 1992  
Mortal Throne Of Nazarene Full-length, 1994  
Upon The Throne Of Apocalypse Full-length, 1996  
Tribute To the Goat Live album, 1997  
The Forsaken Mourning of Angelic Anguish EP, 1997  
Diabolical Conquest Full-length, 1998  
The Infernal Storm Full-length, 2000  
Live - Blasphemy in Brazil tour 2001 Live album, 2001  
Blasphemy Full-length, 2002  
Relapse Singles Series Vol. 3 Split, 2004 
Decimate Christendom Full-length, 2004 
Primordial Domination Full-length, 2006 
Blasphemous Cremation EP, 2008 

All in 320 kbps except the original "Onward to Golgotha" 256kbps and "Blasphemous creamation" 196kbps, sorry. 

MySpace[/url]
